phrs.headword: dear john letter (from woman to man)

phrs.translation: 拼命地， 不顾死活地
尊敬的先生或女士（信笺的开头语）

sentences.sentence: A Canary called out in a trembling voice to its children, "Come away, my dears!"
sentences.translation: 一只金丝雀用颤抖的声音招呼它的孩子们：“走吧，我亲爱的孩子们！”

sentences.sentence: Oh, my poor little feet, I wonder who will put on your shoes and stockings for you now, dears?
sentences.translation: 噢，我可怜的小脚丫，亲爱的，我想知道现在谁来给你们穿鞋和袜子呢？

sentences.sentence: They are as fine healthy children as ever were seen, poor little dears!
sentences.translation: 这些孩子既漂亮又健康，跟谁比都不差，好可怜的小宝贝啊！
